com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.attachments.control

Class PassengerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.attachments.control.PassengerController

  • public class PassengerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Tracks which entities are a passenger of other entities, and handles the synchronization of changes in this. Each viewer of the entity has it's own passenger controller.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PassengerController(org.bukkit.entity.Player viewer)

      Attempts to mount a passenger inside a vehicle.

      Informs a particular Entity Id should be removed from being a passenger or vehicle in this.
      void resend(int entityId)
      Resends any mounting packets for a particular entity.
      void unmount(int vehicleEntityId, int passengerEntityId)
      Makes sure that a passenger entity is no longer mounted in a vehicle.

    • Method Detail

      • resend

        public void resend(int entityId)
        Resends any mounting packets for a particular entity. This is often called after an entity is re-spawned.
        Parameters:
        entityId -

      • remove

        public void remove(int entityId,
                   boolean sendPackets)
        Informs a particular Entity Id should be removed from being a passenger or vehicle in this.
        Parameters:
        entityId - of the entity to remove
        sendPackets - whether to inform the viewer of the changes

      • unmount

        public void unmount(int vehicleEntityId,
                    int passengerEntityId)
        Makes sure that a passenger entity is no longer mounted in a vehicle. Does nothing if the passenger is not mounted in the vehicle.
        Parameters:
        vehicleEntityId -
        passengerEntityId -

      • mount

        public boolean mount(int vehicleEntityId,
                     int passengerEntityId)
        Attempts to mount a passenger inside a vehicle. Mounting may fail if the server is 1.8.8 or before, and another passenger is already mounted in the vehicle.
        Parameters:
        vehicleEntityId -
        passengerEntityId -
        Returns:
        True if the mounting was possible, False if not.
